title: The Age Of Aquarius
description: "Moon People 1" Soon Could Be On Film. Moon People 1 Is based on the turning point for Earth in 2,048 into a new era of space travel and the beginning of the Age of Aquarius. (Moon People 1) The first epic adventure in the Moon People Trilogy series. It sets the stage for Captain David Braymer and a possible future scenario for Earth in 2048. We make new friends called the Powleen’s and get caught in the middle of their war with a race of aliens called the Arcons and their friends the Thracian‘s. We also have our first space battle in our solar system. We really impress our new alien friends the Powleen’s with our laser‘s and Rockets on the Lunar Base 1.
author: Dale M. Courtney
